Substitute language elements by one-expand_expr.

Substitute language elements by one-expand_expr.

prep_deref(lexpr, env = parent.frame())

Arguments

lexpr

language item (captured by substitute())
env

environment to look in

Value

R language element with dequotes and derefs

Examples


resCol1 <- "Sepal_Long"
ratio <- 2
compCol1 <- "Sepal.Width"
f <- function(expr, env = parent.frame()) {
   mt <- substitute(expr)
   deparse(prep_deref(mt, env))
}
expr <- f("Sepal.Length" >= ratio * compCol1)
print(expr)
#> [1] "Sepal.Length >= ratio * Sepal.Width"
iris %.>%
   mutate_se(., resCol1 := expr) %.>%
   head(.)
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species Sepal_Long
#> 1          5.1         3.5          1.4         0.2  setosa      FALSE
#> 2          4.9         3.0          1.4         0.2  setosa      FALSE
#> 3          4.7         3.2          1.3         0.2  setosa      FALSE
#> 4          4.6         3.1          1.5         0.2  setosa      FALSE
#> 5          5.0         3.6          1.4         0.2  setosa      FALSE
#> 6          5.4         3.9          1.7         0.4  setosa      FALSE
